CatDescriptText: Mr. James Layne, 1309 Franklin Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 2 �Do you think that the numbers game should be legalized or outlawed?� answer reads: �I think that they should be legalized because the majority of people don�t want to stop playing them in order to stop them.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of James Layne wearing zippered jacket with wide collar and pockets, holding shopping bag and newspaper, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, May building with Thrift Drugs in background, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
